com.Entities

Class FireEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Sprites.GameEntity
      • com.Entities.FireEngine

  • public class FireEngine
extends GameEntity
    The FireEngine implementation. A sprite capable of moving and colliding with other sprites.
    Since:
    16/12/2019
